what research (or clinical trials) is being done for Gerstmann-Straussler-Scheinker Disease ?,"The NINDS supports and conducts research on TSEs, including GSS. Much of this research is aimed at characterizing the agents that cause these disorders, clarifying the mechanisms underlying them, and, ultimately, finding ways to prevent, treat, and cure them.",NINDS,Gerstmann-Straussler-Scheinker Disease
